remarks: The Moore closure corresponding to the system of closed subspaces is the double orthocomplement operation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
statement:
mrccss.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
mrccss.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ocv ` W ) $.
mrccss.c $e |- C = ( CSubSp ` W ) $.
mrccss.f $e |- F = ( mrCls ` C ) $.
mrccss $p |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ S C_ V ) -> ( F ` S ) = ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` S ) ) ) $.
